Name: TrainingProtocol
Description: Holds information and processes for training a network for a given batch as it can often be complicated. This mostly deals with calculating error.

Properties.Name: requiredOutputNodes
Properties.Description: A list of nodes used for the error calculation.

Properties.Name: learningRate
Properties.Description: Learning rate for the given optimizer.

Properties.Name: optimizer
Properties.Description: Optimizer used for changing perameters to reduce error.

Functions.Name: geError
Functions.Description: Produces a value for error based on the value of requiredOutputNodes. It calls getValue on each outputNode. Made to be overwritten.
